name: Rollaway Glow Highlighter
about: What it is:An instant illuminator, housed in a genius roll-on applicator, that seamlessly melts onto the skin..Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Oleogel: Allows the pigments to glide seamlessly onto the skin..Ingredient Callouts:It is vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This liquid highlighter gives you a glowing look—anytime, anywhere. It adds a stunning, soft-focus sheen, radiance, and iconic dewiness to the skin in an instant with the new and ultramodern highlighter. There’s no glitter or shimmer, just a comfortable, perfectly weightless, lit-from-within look.
ingredients: -Oleogel: Allows the pigments to glide seamlessly onto the skin..-Adhesive Film Formers: Provide a smooth, soft-focus glossy finish..-Pearlescent Pigments: Help deliver a luminous finish to the skin...Hydrogenated Didecene, Isododecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Mica, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. (May Contain +/-): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Roll in circular motions onto large areas of the face or dot for precision application..-Apply to the high points of your face..-Blend with a buffing brush.
